name: Overpixel
description:
Overpixel


Overpixel is a 2d-dimensional adventure game. If you reach new level maps by crossing the sections, you must first kill the creatures and pass the trails. It is a 2D game. That you can spend a good time in Overpixel. There are different types of creatures in the game.

Players
Enemis
Portals
Parkour



  • Bat, crab, bird and lizard

  • Let's fun
